name: Agility
description: Agility is both an LSD liquidity distribution platform and an aUSD trading platform. Our vision is to unlock liquidity for LSD holders and explore more LSD trading scenarios, as well as provide deep liquidity for other LSD-relative protocols. What's the Motivation? We aim to develop a platform that can cater to the needs of LSD holders Higher and Real Yield Unlock the liquidity of LSD at an almost zero cost Other LSD-relative protocols The need for LSD or ETH liquidity
